evidence.claim: BitHuman utilizes AWS Lambdas for serverless computing and API management.
The platform is HIPAA compliant, ensuring the security of health data.
They provide a FHIR API for healthcare data interoperability and integration.
Integration is facilitated through RESTful APIs and Webhooks for real-time data updates.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence of X12 or EDI use cases found on the site.
